page.title: 19Farming in Colney Heath
page.content: Around Colney Heath there are five farms.They are called{Warren {Farm,Coursers Farm,Tollgate {Farm,Franklin Farm, Round House {Farm and Paxtons Farm.Tollgate Farm} was built in the 1700s and has 260 acres.They grow{barley,oilseed rape {and linseed.}At{Warren Farm}winter{ {barley}is grown. At{Roundhouse Farm there was{barley,wheat and oats.}At {Coursers Farm}they grow{barley and {grass}to cut for{hay}for their horses.They had 10 grain bins,3 hay barns,a barn for tractors and stables.
